name: swissgenlive
short_description:
NEW VERSION IS COMING SOON!
The new version will contain only one Image(nouveau instead of nvidia binary and much more)

Creating a liveDVD-USB-pen distribution which is localized for switzerland. Currently still english but swiss keyboard layouts!
optionally it can be installed to harddisk in the future.
the distribution is based on gentoo,rebuilt from scratch, feautures kde and many applications

As mentioned above currently were only Beta!
The software runs allready very stable but many things at the bootprompt not implemented yet.
For best experience I recommend you to run it from a usb pen with unetbootin.
summary: live linux distribution with swiss localization. BETA ONLY FOR NOW
